A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Until this point I was reasonably happy with Disney's expanded universe\, but after watching episode 8 I want a do-over!\n\nWas really looking forward to this film. Have always enjoyed Star Wars but wouldn't have considered myself a die-hard fan\, however i have recently become quite invested in the franchise reading the comics\, watching Star Wars Rebels and what-not. Unfortunately this movie was truly awful\, and I *really* wanted to enjoy it. Hugely disappointed. I don't think I need to go into the specifics as it really ought to be obvious to anyone who watches the film\, and has been covered in detail by others.
